lev

Class LFlags

  • java.lang.Object
    • lev.LFlags
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LFlags
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An object that is meant to hold a set of boolean flags. Takes in byte arrays and converts each bit to its own flag.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
